column4: Hi. I'm a newbie. Just a simple question. How to close the graphic system ( x ) for a better performance?
<alt><ctrl> F1 <--puts you in a virtual terminal but lets X run /etc/init.d/xdm|gdm|kdm stop kills your manager
if you don't want X to start at boot do this (assuming gdm) update-rc.d -f gdm remove
